title: Internet Pirate

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Target a player. Their role card will be replaced with a pirated version. It remains identical, however between five and ten words at random are removed. The removed words can be from anywhere in the role card.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are jailed and the jailor (or equivalent) can execute, the jailor will always execute unless they were pirated.
- You may pirate the same person multiple times to remove more words.

desc:
Post 2622
*It's the 21st century, kid. Times have changed.*
